mean_cn: n.肋，肋腹，侧翼；  v.位于……的侧面
mean_en: the side of an animal between the ribs and the hip; the side of something such as a building or mountain; the left or right side of an army during a battle, or a sports team during a game
sentence: Riders will dig their spurs into horses' flanks in order to make them run faster.
sentence_trans: 骑手们会用靴刺戳马的侧腹来促使它们跑得更快。
